name: Kids Motorcycle No Limits Rider Racing 3D
name_original: Kids Motorcycle No Limits Rider Racing 3D
description:
Explore wonderful city views full of modern buildings, skyscrapers, parks and your own adrenaline! Drive one of the most interesting vehicles at really high speed and feel the wind flying asunder by your sides – it’s a real extreme! Every track is unique, so watch the mini map carefully to avoid obstacles and don’t miss any turn! Watch your opponents and do your best not to crash with them! Remember that if you will reach the finish line at the fourth place, your game would be over!
Jump on your super modern and powerful motorbike, grab a handle bar and rush into the best racing tournament ever with Kids Motorcycle No Limits Rider Racing 3D!
Train your racing skills to become really accurate, fast and dexterous! Leave all your opponents far behind and become the best kid motorbike racer ever! Enjoy fascinating urban city views at really high speeds! Mind that every track differs from each other, so be wise, think ahead and do your best to fit into all difficult turns! Unleash your adrenaline and become one of the most skillful kid motorcycle racers with Kids Motorcycle No Limits Rider Racing 3D!
Earn points for successfully completed tracks and unlock new locations with new interesting missions! Upgrade your super modern motorbike to make it more speedy, comfortable and colorful! Check different skins and become brighter and more visible!
Kids Motorcycle No Limits Rider Racing 3D features:
• Interesting kids motorbike racing simulator
• Various kinds of unlockable tracks
• Colorful motorcycles for more fun
• Amazing 3D graphics
Rush into the fantastic tournament between the best kid motorbike racers! Join the Kids Motorcycle No Limits Rider Racing 3D game and become the real motorbike racing legend of this modern city! Do your best riding through fantastic city tracks, reach the finish line in first and celebrate your childish victory!
